00142 
00143     inline double&  operator()(long i1, long i2)
00144 
00145 {
00146 
00147 #ifndef _NO_BOUNDS_CHECK_
00148 
00149     CAMmatrixBase::indexCheck(Structure,i1,i2);
00150 
00151 #endif
00152 
00153     long* beginPtr = Structure.indexBeginBase.getDataPointer();
00154 
00155     long* endPtr   = Structure.indexEndBase.getDataPointer();
00156 
00157     
00158 
00159     double* dataPtr =  (double*)DataP->dataPointer; 
00160 
00161     
00162 
00163     long offset = 
00164 
00165     (i1 - *(beginPtr)) + 
00166 
00167     ((*endPtr - *beginPtr) + 1)*(i2 - *(beginPtr +1)); 
00168 
00169 
00170 
00171     return (*(dataPtr + offset));
00172 
00173 };
00174 
00175     inline const double&  operator()(long i1, long i2) const
00176 
00177 { 
00178 
00179 #ifndef _NO_BOUNDS_CHECK_
00180 
00181     CAMmatrixBase::indexCheck(Structure,i1,i2);
00182 
00183 #endif
00184 
00185     const long* beginPtr = Structure.indexBeginBase.getDataPointer();
00186 
00187     const long* endPtr   = Structure.indexEndBase.getDataPointer();
00188 
00189     
00190 
00191     double* dataPtr =  (double*)DataP->dataPointer; 
00192 
00193     
00194 
00195     long offset = 
00196 
00197     (i1 - *(beginPtr)) + 
00198 
00199     ((*endPtr - *beginPtr) + 1)*(i2 - *(beginPtr +1)); 
00200 
00201     
00202 
00203     return (*(dataPtr + offset));
00204 
00205 };

00207     const CAMdoubleMatrix  operator()(const CAMrange& R1, const CAMrange& R2) const
00208 
00209 {
00210 
00211     CAMstructureBase Rstructure(Structure);
00212 
00213     Rstructure.setStructureSubset(R1,R2);
00214 
00215     CAMdoubleMatrix A;
00216 
00217     A.Structure.initialize(Rstructure);
00218 
00219     A.DataP = DataP;
00220 
00221     A.DataP->incrementReferenceCount();
00222 
00223     A.DataP->incrementReferenceCount();
00224 
00225     A.referenceFlag = 1;
00226 
00227     return A;
00228 
00229 };
